post.body: Wii bowling's better than sliced bread. Make sure you've got plenty if room to move around w/it.
Sweety took ours down today while I hid in the house. I'd kind of like to leave 'em up year round just to irk the neighbor.
Oh no. Poor kiddo. Hope she gets well soon & the rest of you don't get it!
A mouthful of caramel & butter. Mmmmmmm...
((hug)) I'm sorry. Poor you. Sick sucks.
Waiting for the day to end. 2.5 hours to go!
Resolving to get up early enough to tart myself up before work in 2009. Maybe it will make me feel better.
Delaying going to sleep because I'll have to go to work when I wake up.
Now he's not snoring. I wonder if he's dead when I can't hear him. Snoring is oddly comforting.
Wanting to sneak outta bed & play Hatchlings on Facebook. Not tho. Eyes are burning from too much of it.
How can he snore so loudly & not wake himself up?
Thinking my ass has become part of the couch. Must get up now.
fresh thoughts...Bonding http://www.skitteringthoughts.com/2009/01/bonding/
Hiding in bed. The house us too messy. Maybe if I ignore it, it'll go away.
Busy as hell. I'd like to hide under my desk. Losing the war against The Stupid. I LIKE verbal abuse! Yummy!
Someone in Cubeville is eating fried chicken. The odor is gag worthy. Hope her trash is emptied soon.
6 long days til my texts reset & I can use them again. :le sigh:
Going to beddy-bye.
Just lost 2 hours of life spying on people on Facebook. Sheesh.
fresh thoughts...Happy January 2! http://tinyurl.com/7jc2nh
